div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 514 Caprioru, c. 18 km. NW of Tîrgoviste, Rumania, 1956 Burial: 150-125 B.C. (Preda) Contents: 101 AR. Pot hoard Macedonia, 1st Region: 97 tetradr. (very well preserved) Thasos: 4 spread-flan tetradr. Disposition: Tîrgoviste 80 Macedonia, 4 Thasos; Bucharest (Inst. Arch.) 4 Macedonia Preda, SCN 2 (1958), pp. 389-93, illus. † Chirila-Mihaescu, Der Münzhort von Caprioru (Dîmbovita, 1969), illus.
